video.title: Reading Habits Tag
video.html:
This tag has been around for a couple of years but the original is private so I can’t link to it! I found it on the channel of the dazzling Ariel Bissett.

Accidentally missed answering #7 (reading at home or everywhere) but to be honest it’s not very relevant at the moment.

timestamps.text: Do you have a certain place at home for reading?
Bookmark or random piece of paper?
At what point do you stop reading?
Do you eat or drink while reading?
Multitasking: Music or TV while reading?
One book at a time or several at once?
Reading out lout or silently in your head?
Do you read ahead or even skip pages?
Breaking the spine or keeping it like new?
Do you write in your books?
